text: Læa cng rảlụk t̄hụng k̄hṇa thī̀ phracêā k̄hx ngxi brxḥīm dị̂ thds̄xb k̄heā d̂wy phra bạỵchā bāng prakār læ̂w k̄heā k̆dị̂ s̄nxng tāmph ra bạỵchā nận doy khrbt̄ĥwn phraxngkh̒ trạs̄ ẁā thæ̂cring k̄ĥā ca h̄ı̂ cêā pĕn p̄hū̂nả mnus̄ʹy̒ chāti k̄heā kl̀āw ẁā læa cāk lūk h̄lān k̄hxng k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ d̂wy phraxngkh̒ trạs̄ ẁā s̄ạỵỵā k̄hxng k̄ĥā nận ca mị̀ dị̂kæ̀ brrdā p̄hū̂ xṭhrrm
